p: The goal of this study was to identify the key proteins underlying the alleviated Al toxicity in P. massoniana under ectomycorrhizal fungi inoculation. We employed a comparative proteomics approach to probe the symbiotic relationship of S. luteus and P. massoniana seedlings in response to Al toxicity. This study provides insight into the proteome variations induced by ectomycorrhizal fungi under Al toxicity in P. massoniana.
